meanings.sent1: I bought a multipack of pencils for school.
meanings.sent2: The store sells a multipack of snacks for a better value.
meanings.sent3: Carrying a multipack of water bottles can be heavy but convenient.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like opening a multipack of joy.
meanings.sent5: The multipack of colorful markers caught my eye immediately.

meanings.definition: To package multiple items together for sale or distribution
meanings.sent1: The company will multipack the candies before shipping them out.
meanings.sent2: We need to multipack the products to save time during packaging.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally multipacked my socks with my friend's laundry.
meanings.sent4: She multipacked her thoughts into a coherent presentation.
meanings.sent5: The team decided to multipack the items for easier distribution.
